channel.title: !HELP, no one else can, I have video of prob!
channel.description:
Question:
I join my server by logging in with: Server IP: 0.0.0.0 Port: 5555
I can logon but noone else can. I have read the probably about every guide on here. I have forwarded ALL my ports correctly. Disabled Firewalls. Disabled Anti-virus.
I am using pimpscape source (is there another one I should try?)
1. I run the compiler.bat 2. I run runserver.bat 3. I login on my server 4. Noone else can log on
I have a video of my problem, download my video from:
http://rapidshare.com/files/76860847/clip0002.avi
Watch it on full screen so none of the text displays weird.
Then post what my problem could be.
Thanks....
NOTE: You can also watch it on youtube at:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDTMP-ZeHzM

item.title: !HELP, no one else can, I have video of prob!
item.dc:creator: @vthokie4me vthokie4me
item.description:
@vthokie4me wrote:

I know, I have that, its setup. My Ip is used in No-IP

Read full topic
item.source: !HELP, no one else can, I have video of prob!

item.title: !HELP, no one else can, I have video of prob!
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

to find out your ip, go to http://cmyip.com, then set the no-ip domain to go to whatever set of numbers it tells you. example: 123.123.123.123 OR tell your friend to go to the set of numbers to cut out having to go to no-ip and resetting the domain address.

Read full topic

item.description:
@vthokie4me wrote:

they are connecting to my No-ip host which is taclan.no-ip.info but it wont let them in and I use 0.0.0.0 to login on mine.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

0 isnt your ip. Im not exactly familiar with using no ip since i dont have a router…But the 0 number is NOT your ip.
